CustomField.formula: IF(Account.CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c =True,IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c =True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Credit_Card_Processing__c= True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_FSA__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_PAO__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Sales_Tax__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), IF(Account.Referral_National_Account__r.Digital_Marketing__c = True, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow", 20, 20), NULL ))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
There are CPA Sensitivities for this Prospect-Client please verify which one(s) prior to making contact.
If this is a National Account, the Referral National Account Field may also impact sensitivity
CustomField.label: CPA Sensitivities Flag
